title: game crash in loading screen every time
body:
this massage popes up
"You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again."
bring me back to the client hitting "reconnect" and again
my internet is fine btw

replies.body:
Happened to me about a month ago for about a week. Right after champ select the game would crash. I'm on a Mac, OCE server. What's more frustrating than the DC is the fact that make you agree to not AFK! 

Now it doesn't happen, but experiencing a different issue, keep having mini DC's throughout the game. It's the most infuriating and tilting during critical times like in the middle of a teamfight. 

Please Rito can you get better servers?

While you may have access to other sites or services, it doesn't mean your connection to the League servers is fine, since each service you access online resides in a different geolocation. I strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure you aren't running any incompatible network settings that could conflict with League.

Let me know if this caused any change.
